place.name: EGLWYS BREWYS
place.gazetteerText: EGLWYS-BREWIS, a parish in Bridgend district, Glamorgan; near the coast, 4 miles S of Cowbridge r. station, and 10 SSW of Llantrisant. Post town, St. Athan, under Cowbridge. Acres, 367. Real property, £397. Pop., 21. Houses, 3. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £93. Patron, J. D. Llewelyn, Esq. The church measures 33 feet by 21. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
